name: Update SEO Meta for Posts and Categories
author: s3k.biz

sections.description: Add Custom SEO Meta tags for WordPress posts and categories without any hassle and easy to use. This is a cool plugin that makes it easier to add SEO meta.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Categories -> Edit/Update Category
  4. Update SEO Meta Title, Keyword and Description for Categories
  5. Go to Posts -> Edit/Update Post
  6. Update SEO Meta Title, Keyword and Description for posts
sections.faq:
Why was this plugin created?

This plugin was created to for the custom seo meta titles and keywords.
